product_name: Merrell Lorelei Link Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The zippy, low-profile Merrell Lorelei Link Shoes are ready to play on casual excursions, with their nubuck leather and breathable mesh uppers that feel great with or without socks. Airy nylon mesh uppers supply excellent breathability and flexibility; nubuck leather helps protect uppers and adds a touch of structure. Discreet center zipper offers a quick, comfortable fit and easy entry and exit; heel tabs aid the process. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from feet; Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial treatment deters odor development. Q-Form(TM) alignment system provides women with a precise anatomic fit for superb, tailored comfort. EVA midsoles with air cushion heel pods deliver cushioning comfort underfoot; molded nylon arch shanks add support and help control flex. Merrell Lorelei Link Shoes have low-profile rubber outsoles for everyday use. Closeout.
short_description: The zippy, low-profile Merrell Lorelei Link Shoes are ready to play on casual excursions, with their nubuck leather and breathable mesh uppers that feel great with or without socks.
